requisition.translation[0].definitions[0: if someone in authority, especially the army, requisitions a building, vehicle, or food, they officially demand to have it during an emergency such as a war
The building was requisitioned as a military hospital for the duration of the war.
requisition.translation[1].definitions[0: an official written order for something
The department must receive apurchase requisition before the items can be supplied.
requisition.translation[2].definitions[0: to officially ask for something in writing
One of its stakeholders has requisitioned an extraordinary general meeting.
